title: TSUNAMI WARNING ISSUED !
content: TSUNAMI BULLETIN NUMBER 005 PACIFIC TSUNAMI WARNING CENTER/NOAA/NWS ISSUED AT 1151Z 11 APR 2012 THIS BULLETIN IS FOR ALL AREAS OF THE INDIAN OCEAN. -AN INDIAN-OCEAN-WIDE TSUNAMI WATCH IS IN EFFECT -A MAJOR AFTERSHOCK OCCURRED AT 1043Z WITH MAGNITUDE 8.3 … THE WATCH AREA IS NOW REDUCED … A TSUNAMI WATCH IS IN EFFECT FOR…
